com.wookler.zconfig.common

Class AbstractState<T extends IStateEnum<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wookler.zconfig.common.AbstractState<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - State enum to be managed.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientState, EnvState, NodeState, ReaderState, ServiceState

    public abstract class AbstractState<T extends IStateEnum<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class used to define state of objects/instances.

        public T getState()
        Get the current state.
        Returns:
        - Current state

      • setState

        public void setState(T state)
        Update the state to the specified state.

      • getError

        public java.lang.Throwable getError()
        Get the exception associated with this state. Exception handle will be returned only if the current state is error.
        Returns:
        - Exception handle, null if state is not error.

      • setError

        public void setError(java.lang.Throwable error)
        Set the exception handle for this state instance. Will also set the current state to error state.
        Parameters:
        error - - Exception handle.

      • hasError

        public boolean hasError()
        Check if the state is in Error State.
        Returns:
        - In error state?
